document.full_text: treasury secretary timothy geithner said on wednesday that the economy will face crises after it recovers from the deep recession that officially ended in 2009, but they will be less severe.
document.title: future crises unlikely as severe as last: geithner
lines_and_colors: treasury secretary timothy geithner said on wednesday that the economy will face crises after it recovers from the deep recession that officially ended in 2009, but they will be less severe.
